ROD PAVEZ wrote:

> I apologize Nate. I'v been out of town awhile and haven't checked my 
> email recently. Now that you mention its a parody I still wonder why 
> anyone would waste their time on creating a site that pokes fun at the 
> perspective most Americans have of ninja. I mean will it change the 
> attitude? Somebody's wasting their time I think. And definitely 
> sarcasm is not something you spare Nate.
> Later.
>
> Nate Ledbetter <ltdomer98@...> wrote:
>
> --- ROD PAVEZ <grfkboyz@...> wrote:
> > Ha, ha, ha, ha, ha, ha!!!!! Who in God's name
> > created that site. It reads like a child wrote it.
> > Ninja just flip out and kill people? Ha, ha, ha!!!!
> > Somebody put the author out of his misery, please!
>
> And once again we have to explain that it`s a PARODY
> site...
>
> Sarcasm, Irony....a lost art, it seems.
>
